"Attribute Weaknesses":
"All Techniques, and some weapons, have one of the six Attributes:
Fire, Ice, Lightning, Wind, Light or Dark.

In addition, each enemy has one or more Attribute weaknesses. If you attack an enemy with a weapon or Technique that matches their weakness, you can deal more damage than normal."

"Some enemies will enter a special Down phase called \"Attribute Down\" if continually attacked with their weakness Attribute.

To check what your weapon's Attribute is, open the Main Menu, select \"Equipment/Subpalette\", select \"Equip Weapon\", then check \"Item Details\".
Techniques' Attributes are shown under \"Technique Details\"."
